catalog_metadata.name: Content Sources Catalog
catalog_metadata.description: Comprehensive catalog of influential websites across multiple domains for content extraction and knowledge base building

ai_tools_and_news.description: Latest AI developments, tools, releases, and industry news

extraction_todo_list.extraction_notes: All sources verified as paywall-free. Prioritize RSS feeds and API-based sources for easier extraction.
